existing_features.title: Create a multi-section informational website for the spice exporter business "Amodkar Blue Ocean Trade" that presents credible buyer-facing information and is suitable for brand-name searches.
Apply one coherent visual theme that feels simple and classy (avoid blue/purple), including consistent typography, spacing, and component styling across the site.

Implement basic SEO-focused page structure for brand discoverability, including correct page title, meta description, and semantic headings that contain the business name and core offering (spice exporter).
Add a "Products" section that communicates the product category (spices) and showcases a short list of example spice items with a clean card/grid layout.
Add a "Contact" section with clear buyer contact details and a lightweight inquiry form that stores inquiries in the app (no external email/SMS integrations).
Add generated brand-appropriate static images (logo and a subtle spice-themed hero visual) and render them from the frontend as static assets (not served through the backend).

Update the global visual theme to feel more bold and classy while keeping a premium, simple aesthetic (no blue/purple), by increasing contrast, sharpening typography hierarchy, and refining the warm/earthy palette via CSS variables and Tailwind theme tokens.

Make the header/navigation feel more premium and decisive by improving its scrolled state (background, shadow, border/blur, and link/button emphasis) and ensuring mobile menu styling matches the updated bold/classy theme.

Upgrade the hero section styling to feel more bold and classy by refining the background overlay/gradient, increasing headline impact, and making primary/secondary CTAs look more premium (button weight, outline treatment, spacing).

Make cards and section blocks across Products/About/Quality/Contact feel more bold and classy by refining shadows, borders, radii, spacing, and hover states consistently (e.g., ProductCard, About feature cards, Quality stats block, Contact info blocks).

Add a new "Mission" section to the homepage with an English mission statement drafted for Amodkar Blue Ocean Trade (spice exporter), matching the existing premium/classy theme and using a consistent Section layout.
Add "Mission" to the site navigation so users can scroll to the Mission section from both desktop and mobile header navigation, and include it in the footer quick links.

Update the Contact section UI to display the provided buyer contact details from the business profile, and present the WhatsApp number as a WhatsApp contact method (label and link) rather than a generic placeholder phone value.

Replace the illustrated spice images used in the Products section with real (photographic) spice images, by updating the product image URLs in frontend/src/components/site/sections/ProductsSection.tsx to point to the new generated photo assets in /assets/generated.

Replace the illustrated hero-side image in frontend/src/components/site/sections/HeroSection.tsx (currently /assets/generated/spice-illustration-assorted.dim_800x600.png) with a real (photographic) spices image asset in /assets/generated while keeping the existing layout and styling intact.
